Name: 香江之龙，Dragon of Hongkong
About the game: ’Dragon of Hongkong'is a third-person combat game based on wars between Hongkong triads. In this game, you occupy territories, kill your foes. The map includes Kowlong, Hongkong island and many outlying islands. You can also recruit sexy dancers and compete in racing game.
